Settings.QueryText:
SELECT ProductsAndServicesList.Ref AS Ref, ProductsAndServicesList.Ref AS ProductsAndServices, ProductsAndServicesList.Code AS Code, ProductsAndServicesList.SKU AS SKU, ProductsAndServicesList.Description AS Description, ProductsAndServicesList.MeasurementUnit AS MeasurementUnit, ProductsAndServicesList.UseCharacteristics AS UseCharacteristics, ProductsAndServicesList.UseBatches AS UseBatches, SUM(InventoryBalances.QuantityBalance) AS Balance, SUM(CASE WHEN InventoryBalances.CustomerOrder = VALUE(Document.CustomerOrder.EmptyRef) THEN 0 ELSE InventoryBalances.QuantityBalance END) AS Reserve, SUM(InventoryBalances.QuantityBalance - CASE WHEN InventoryBalances.CustomerOrder = VALUE(Document.CustomerOrder.EmptyRef) THEN 0 ELSE InventoryBalances.QuantityBalance END) AS AvailableBalance, CASE WHEN VALUETYPE(ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.MeasurementUnit) = Type(Catalog.UOMClassifier) THEN ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.Price ELSE ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.Price / ISNULL(ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.MeasurementUnit.Factor, 1) END AS Price FROM Catalog.ProductsAndServices AS ProductsAndServicesList LEFT JOIN AccumulationRegister.Inventory.Balance( , Company = &Company AND Not ProductsAndServices.IsFolder AND StructuralUnit = &StructuralUnit AND ProductsAndServices.ProductsAndServicesType IN (&ProductsAndServicesType)) AS InventoryBalances ON ProductsAndServicesList.Ref = InventoryBalances.ProductsAndServices LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.ProductsAndServicesPrices.SliceLast(&PricePeriod, PriceKind = &PriceKind) AS ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast ON ProductsAndServicesList.Ref = ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.ProductsAndServices AND (ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.Characteristic = VALUE(Catalog.ProductsAndServicesCharacteristics.EmptyRef)) WHERE Not ProductsAndServicesList.IsFolder AND ProductsAndServicesList.ProductsAndServicesType IN(&ProductsAndServicesType)
GROUP BY ProductsAndServicesList.Ref, ProductsAndServicesList.Code, ProductsAndServicesList.SKU, ProductsAndServicesList.Description, ProductsAndServicesList.MeasurementUnit, ProductsAndServicesList.UseCharacteristics, ProductsAndServicesList.UseBatches, ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.Price, CASE WHEN VALUETYPE(ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.MeasurementUnit) = Type(Catalog.UOMClassifier) THEN ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.Price ELSE ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.Price / ISNULL(ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.MeasurementUnit.Factor, 1) END

SELECT CatalogProductsAndServices.Description AS GroupItem, CatalogProductsAndServices.Ref AS ProductsAndServicesRef FROM Catalog.ProductsAndServices AS CatalogProductsAndServices WHERE CatalogProductsAndServices.IsFolder

SELECT InventoryBalances.ProductsAndServices.Ref AS ProductsAndServices, InventoryBalances.Characteristic.Description AS Characteristic, InventoryBalances.Characteristic.Ref AS Ref, InventoryBalances.Characteristic.Ref AS CharacteristicRef, InventoryBalances.Batch.Description AS Batch, InventoryBalances.Batch.Ref AS BatchRef, SUM(InventoryBalances.QuantityBalance) AS Balance, SUM(CASE WHEN InventoryBalances.CustomerOrder = VALUE(Document.CustomerOrder.EmptyRef) THEN 0 ELSE InventoryBalances.QuantityBalance END) AS Reserve, SUM(InventoryBalances.QuantityBalance - CASE WHEN InventoryBalances.CustomerOrder = VALUE(Document.CustomerOrder.EmptyRef) THEN 0 ELSE InventoryBalances.QuantityBalance END) AS AvailableBalance, CASE WHEN VALUETYPE(ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.MeasurementUnit) = Type(Catalog.UOMClassifier) THEN ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.Price ELSE ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.Price / ISNULL(ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.MeasurementUnit.Factor, 1) END AS Price FROM AccumulationRegister.Inventory.Balance( , Company = &Company AND (ProductsAndServices.UseCharacteristics OR ProductsAndServices.UseBatches) AND StructuralUnit = &StructuralUnit AND TRUE AND ProductsAndServices.ProductsAndServicesType IN (&ProductsAndServicesType)) AS InventoryBalances LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.ProductsAndServicesPrices.SliceLast( &PricePeriod, (ProductsAndServices.UseCharacteristics OR ProductsAndServices.UseBatches) AND ProductsAndServices.ProductsAndServicesType IN (&ProductsAndServicesType) AND PriceKind = &PriceKind) AS ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast ON InventoryBalances.ProductsAndServices = ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.ProductsAndServices AND (ISNULL(InventoryBalances.Characteristic, VALUE(Catalog.ProductsAndServicesCharacteristics.EmptyRef)) = ISNULL(ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.Characteristic, VALUE(Catalog.ProductsAndServicesCharacteristics.EmptyRef)))
GROUP BY InventoryBalances.Characteristic, InventoryBalances.Batch, InventoryBalances.ProductsAndServices.Ref, ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.Price, CASE WHEN VALUETYPE(ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.MeasurementUnit) = Type(Catalog.UOMClassifier) THEN ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.Price ELSE ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.Price / ISNULL(ProductsAndServicesPricesSliceLast.MeasurementUnit.Factor, 1) END, InventoryBalances.Characteristic.Description, InventoryBalances.Characteristic.Ref, InventoryBalances.Batch.Description, InventoryBalances.Batch.Ref

v8:item.v8:content: Products and services group for selection in dynamic lists
Группа номенклатуры для отбора в динамических списках
Query result into new document (document kind)
Результат запроса в новый документ (вид документа)
Pricing in various units of measure
Учет цен в различных единицах измерения
Вид цен округлять в большую сторону
Unique identifier of the owner form
Add new rows to the document
Добавить товар не заходя в характеристику
Добавить товар не заходя в характеристику
With filter by products and services group (recommended)
С учетом отбора по Группе номенклатуры (рекомендуется)
